name: Ana Lisa Hedstrom
biography: Ana Lisa Hedstrom (b. 1943) grew up in Detroit and got her B.A. from Mills College. She is best known for her interpretive use of combining Japanese arashi shibori technique with digital scanning. Hedstrom continuously surprises with her bold and seductive fabrics. Hand-dyeing each piece to make them unique, she embraces Eastern and Western traditions, cutting and folding the cloth for her specific needs.
